about.details:
Incorporated in 2006, Mumbai based KHFM Hospitality and Facility Management Services Limited provides integrated hospitality and facility management services to PSUs, MNCs, Railways, and other commercials. The company primarily offers Security Service, Horticulture & Gardening, Hospitality Services & Catering, and Facility Management services. It has a PAN India presence with site offices in 21 cities across 10 states.

The company works on an asset-light model where it maintains fewer capital assets as compared to the value of its working capital requirements. The majority of revenues of KHFM is generated from soft services such as Guest House Management & Catering, Hospitality Services, Facility Management, and housekeeping services.

KHFM Hospitality and Facility Management Services Limited obtain the majority of business through Tender Process which includes competitive bidding process. Some of the contracts of the company are with the government agencies and Government of India which may be affected by the change in government policies in future.

The competitive strengths of the company are:

• Experienced team with domain expertise
• 70% client retention for last 2-years
• Technological advancement
• Diversified service portfolio
• PAN India presence

faqs.question: What is the KHFM HOSPITALITY IPO?
faqs.answer:
KHFM HOSPITALITY IPO is a SME IPO of 2950000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.62 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹36 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on March 22, 2019, and closes on April 4, 2019.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in KHFM HOSPITALITY IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in KHFM HOSPITALITY IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in KHFM HOSPITALITY IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in KHFM HOSPITALITY IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'KHFM HOSPITALITY IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for KHFM HOSPITALITY IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in KHFM HOSPITALITY IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
